name: American Public Education, Inc.
description: American Public Education, Inc. (APEI) is a leading provider of online postsecondary education and professional development. Founded in 2003, the company operates through its two primary subsidiaries: American Military University (AMU) and American Public University (APU), which offer a wide range of undergraduate and graduate degree programs designed to meet the needs of working adults and military personnel. APEI is committed to providing affordable, accessible, and high-quality education while leveraging innovative technology to enhance the learning experience. The institution emphasizes flexibility in education, allowing students to balance their academic pursuits with personal and professional responsibilities. APEI's mission is to empower individuals through education, fostering a culture of lifelong learning and professional growth. With a focus on serving the unique needs of military students and their families, APEI offers specialized support services and programs tailored to veterans and active-duty personnel. The company continuously evolves its curriculum and course offerings to align with industry trends, ensuring that graduates are well-prepared to meet the demands of the workforce. As the education landscape shifts toward online learning, APEI remains at the forefront, championing innovative educational solutions that cater to a diverse student body.

seo.meta_title: American Public Education, Inc. | Online Learning & Professional Development
seo.meta_description: Explore American Public Education, Inc. (APEI) for innovative online education solutions. Discover degree programs, professional development, and military support.

faq.question: What is APEI known for?
faq.answer: APEI is known for providing affordable and accessible online education, primarily serving military personnel and working adults.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of APEI?
faq.answer: Angela Selden is the CEO of American Public Education, Inc.

faq.question: Where is APEI headquartered?
faq.answer: APEI is headquartered in Charles Town, West Virginia, USA.

faq.question: What types of programs does APEI offer?
faq.answer: APEI offers a variety of online degree programs, including associate, bachelor's, and master's degrees, as well as professional development courses.
